name: Twitch-Rooting
description:
You want to have some mathmatical fun with your Twitch-Community? Don't look further! Just play Twitch-Rooting!
Created at the GGJ2023 in Kiel, this game allows you to compete against each other in finding the square-roots of numbers!

You have Questions? Visit my discord or Twitch-Channel!
All infos available at https://www.twitch.tv/wtfdarky

Made with Godot.
